title: Simulation-Based Mathematical Literacy Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Customized curriculum for improving language comprehension skills necessary for mathematical problem-solving. Emphasizes real-life scenario-based learning activities in VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners will enhance their ability to accurately recognize and analyze key information in mathematical problems.
Learners will apply step-by-step problem-solving strategies in a VR simulation environment to apply mathematical concepts to real-world situations.
Learners will systematically document and present mathematical reasoning processes through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
